data.name: Malice
data.detailed_description:
From the minds of Nimbus Games, Malice is a first-person 2 player compulsory co-op survival horror. Fallen into a sinkhole when visiting one of Japan's mysterious temple shrines, you discover a nightmarish sunken mansion, with a sinister presence lingering while you explore its dark corridors and terrifying threats emerge from every corner as the mansion walls twists and warps around you.

The only way to out is in. Unforgiving choices to be made, and you must rely on your wits to survive. Will you face adversity head on, or sneak through the shadows to see the light of day again?

  • Face the nightmare... together
    Confront an ancient evil treacherous presence with your friend.

  • Discover Horrifying Domains
    Explore as far or quickly as you dare, but tread wisely and carefully.

  • Gauntlet of the wits
    Work and survive together by using only your wits and problem solving skills.

  • Visceral Horror and Suspense
    Enter a frightening world filled with anxiety-inducing thrills and disturbing moments.

Note: This game can only be played with 2 players

data.short_description: You fall through a sinkhole and discovers a nightmarish Japanese sunken mansion, with a sinister presence lingering and terrifying threats. The only way to out is in. Malice is a 2 player compulsory co-op survival horror, where you make unforgiving choices and rely on your wits to survive.
data.supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3.4GHz or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Some scenes and story elements with implications of violence and depictions of gore.
